profile:
Smooth Ceiling Ltd
Smooth Ceiling specializes in removing stipple, other know as stucco/popcorn from your ceilings. 
Our team take pride in the work we do and we ourselves on making sure we get the job done right, and on your time schedule. Each area is covered and protected from floor to ceiling to ensure that dust does not seep through out the house. We specialize in turning your stucco ceiling to a smooth and perfect finish. 
We're dedicated to providing you the resources and services you need to modernize your home., 
We remove your outdated popcorn ceiling in a fast, clean and efficient manner.
Acoustic ceiling also known as the "popcorn ceiling" was in fashion over thirty years ago, but now new houses do not have these ceilings unless you request it prior to a new home being built.
Many home owners are also removing the stipple in their homes for benefits such as

Many benefits to the removal of Popcorn/Acoustic Ceilings:
	•	Brightens the room 
	•	Increase Re-sale Value
	•	Damage Control
        •	Modernizes the look      
	•	Less Dust and les Spider Webs
	•	Cleaner, Professional Look
	•	And much more…

Popcorn Ceiling Removal / Stucco Removal - Painting - Water Damaged Ceilings - Drywall Repairs - Pot Lights- Crown Moulding-Custom Kitchens-Custom Closets
service_area: Richmond Hill, Markham, Thornhill, Vaughn, Woodbridge, Toronto,  Stoufville, Kleinburg, Maple, KIng City. North York, Scarborough, Etobicoke
services: Popcorn ceiling removal / stucco removal - Painting - Water Damaged Ceilings - Drywall Repairs - Pot Lights- Crown Moulding-Custom Kitchens-Custom Closets
brands: Smooth Ceiling Ltd works with the highest quality of material such as  Benjamin Moore CGC plaster, Anchore protective Paper etc
specialities: We specialize in transforming your rough outdated ceiling into a  work of art.  We make sure that we meet your budget and time line. We protect your floors and walls from top to bottom to ensure that the dust does not seep into other rooms nor your furnace. We close off your vents and air intakes.  We use a wet method to remove the stucco "popcorn", then apply multiple coats of plaster to you're ceiling to insure the stability and longevity. We then use an LED to double check for any imperfections we might of missed. We feather sand the ceiling to a smooth finish and proceed by priming and painting the project with a top Benjamin Moore prime and paint. We finish the job by cleaning the work area and disposing the garbage.
name: Smooth Ceiling Ltd

profile:
Ceiling Champions services the GTA and surrounding area's for stucco "popcorn" removal, repair, and refinishing of ceilings. We also can provide you with Crown Moulding, Painting, and PotLights. We also renovate Kitchens, Bathroom, and Cabinet Designs.

Ceiling Champions are here to restore or improve your ceiling or renovation project to 100% and beyond. Our top quality workmanship and attention to detail continue to earn confidence with homeowners in the GTA.

If you’re in the GTA; Etobicoke, Mississauga, Brampton, Ajax, Pickering, Oakville or nearby area, please give us a call to discuss stucco removal, ceiling repair, custom closets, kitchens & bathrooms, Crown Moulding or any other drywall related renovation.

profile:
Maple Express Painting, Toronto is a full service painting and renovating company providing service to residents of Toronto and the rest of GTA. We specialize in exterior and interior painting of both residential and commercial projects. No job is too big or small for us. We provide a complete range of painting services, and with well over a decade of experience in the industry.

We provide full service home renovation services including drywall repair and installation, caulking, stucco work, as well as general contracting work. Our stellar reputation of high quality service and fast and efficient work has helped us to grow our business phenomenally.

We service Toronto, Vaughan, Richmond Hill, Markam, Newmarket, Mississauga, Brampton, Milton, Aurora, Etobicoke, Scarborough, and the rest of the GTA. Phone us today to transform your property into a marvel!

Why would you choose to use Maple Express Painting
• We provide Guarantee on all our work
• Fully bonded workers
• Hundreds of satisfied clients to provide reference of work
• Use of top quality paint including Benjamin Moore, Dulux, Behr, Sherwin Williams, Para etc.
• We are exceptionally clean and tidy and utilize drop sheets for every job.

Home Renovations - remodeling living rooms, living space, corridors, ceilings, flooring.

Bathrooms - remodeling or building from scratch - experience in tiling, grouting, painting, priming, tile installation (marble, ceramic, laminate), plumbing, bathtub and toilet installation

Kitchens - remodeling or installation of new kitchen - we do everything from tiling, standard and custom made cupboard installation, backsplash, painting, countertop (laminate or granite) installation, plumbing, etc.

Painting - priming, painting, puttying, spraying sanding - walls, ceilings, staining 

Plastering - taping, patching, skimming 
walls/ceilings 

PHONE NUMBER: (647) 703-0020
Email: maplexpainting@gmail.com

profile:
POPCORN CEILING/STUCCO REMOVAL:

When you think of a modern interior in a home, popcorn ceilings usually don’t make the cut. In fact, popcorn ceilings usually make a home look dated and unattractive.

Instead, a smooth ceiling has the opposite effect: it can enhance the look of a home’s interior and give it a more modern finish and feel.
But what can you do if your home has popcorn ceilings? Whether you’re looking to improve the aesthetics of your home for your own purposes or are looking to give your home a boost before selling it, removing your popcorn ceilings in favor of a smooth ceiling can make a massive difference in the look of your home.

Luckily, removing popcorn ceilings and opting for a smooth ceiling instead is as easy as making the call to professionals in popcorn ceiling removal. 
 (  These are just some of the reasons why you should upgrade your ceilings)
                  
To eliminate falling white specs
To increase your resale value
Popcorn ceilings are old-fashioned
Popcorn ceilings trap allergens
Popcorn ceilings are a breeding ground for dust-mites and spiders
They bring down the height of the ceiling
Makes room appear darker as the texture absorbs shadows from light
Makes house look modern

Let The AK PLASTERING in TORONTO transform your out dated popcorn ceilings into smooth, modern masterpieces!

The Services We Provide :
--------------------------------------
Popcorn Ceiling /Stucco Removal
--------------------------------------
Plastering -Taping 
--------------------------------------
Painting-Spray painting
name: AK Plastering (Popcorn Ceiling/Stucco Removal)
